verses.verse: At that time,<WH6256> says<WH5002> Yahweh,<WH3068> they shall bring out<WH3318> the bones<WH6106> of the kings<WH4428> of Judah,<WH3063> and the bones<WH6106> of his princes,<WH8269> and the bones<WH6106> of the priests,<WH3548> and the bones<WH6106> of the prophets,<WH5030> and the bones<WH6106> of the inhabitants<WH3427> of Jerusalem,<WH3389> out of their graves;<WH6913>

and they shall spread<WH7849> them before the sun,<WH8121> and the moon,<WH3394> and all the army<WH6635> of the sky,<WH8064> which they have loved,<WH157> and which they have served,<WH5647> and after<WH310> which they have walked,<WH1980> and which they have sought,<WH1875> and which they have worshiped:<WH7812> they shall not be gathered,<WH622> nor be buried,<WH6912> they shall be for dung<WH1828> on the surface<WH6440> of the earth.<WH127>

Death<WH4194> shall be chosen<WH977> rather than life<WH2416> by all the residue<WH7611> that remain<WH7604> of this evil<WH7451> family,<WH4940> that remain<WH7604> in all the places<WH4725> where I have driven<WH5080> them,<WH5002> says Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies.<WH6635>
Moreover you shall tell<WH559> them,<WH559> Thus says Yahweh:<WH3068> Shall men fall,<WH5307> and not rise<WH6965> up again?<WH7725> Shall one turn away, and not return?<WH7725>
Why then is this people<WH5971> of Jerusalem<WH3389> slidden back<WH7725> by a perpetual<WH5329> backsliding?<WH4878> they hold<WH2388> fast deceit,<WH8649> they refuse<WH3985> to return.<WH7725>

I listened<WH7181> and heard,<WH8085> but they didn't<WH1696> speak aright: no man<WH376> repents<WH5162> him of<WH5921> his wickedness,<WH7451> saying,<WH559> What have I done?<WH6213> everyone turns<WH7725> to his course,<WH4794> as a horse<WH5483> that rushes<WH7857> headlong in the battle.<WH4421>

Yes,<WH2624> the stork in the sky<WH8064> knows<WH3045> her appointed times;<WH4150> and the turtledove<WH8449> and the swallow<WH5693> and the crane<WH5483> observe<WH8104> the time<WH6256> of their coming;<WH935> but my people<WH5971> don't<WH3045> know Yahweh<WH3068>'s law.<WH4941>

How do you say,<WH559> We are wise,<WH2450> and the law<WH8451> of Yahweh<WH3068> is with us?<WH403> But, behold, the false<WH8267> pen<WH5842> of the scribes<WH5608> has worked<WH6213> falsely.<WH8267>

The wise<WH2450> men are disappointed,<WH3001> they are dismayed<WH2865> and taken:<WH3920> behold,<WH3988> they have rejected the word<WH1697> of Yahweh;<WH3068> and what kind of wisdom is in them?<WH2451>

Therefore will I give<WH5414> their wives<WH802> to others,<WH312> and their fields<WH7704> to those who shall possess<WH3423> them:<WH6996> for everyone from the least even to the greatest<WH1419> is given<WH1214> to covetousness;<WH1215> from the prophet<WH5030> even to the priest<WH3548> every one deals<WH6213> falsely.<WH8267>
They have healed<WH7495> the hurt<WH7667> of the daughter<WH1323> of my people<WH5971> slightly,<WH7043> saying,<WH559> Peace,<WH7965> peace;<WH7965> when there is no peace.<WH7965>

Were they ashamed<WH3001> when they had committed<WH6213> abomination?<WH8441> nay,<WH954> they were not at all ashamed,<WH954> neither could<WH3045> they blush:<WH3637> therefore shall they fall<WH5307> among those who fall;<WH5307> in the time<WH6256> of their visitation<WH6486> they shall be cast down,<WH3782> says<WH559> Yahweh.<WH3068>

I will utterly<WH622> consume<WH5486> them,<WH5002> says Yahweh:<WH3068> no grapes<WH6025> shall be on the vine,<WH1612> nor figs<WH8384> on the fig tree,<WH8384> and the leaf<WH5929> shall fade;<WH5034> and the things that I have given<WH5414> them shall pass away from them.<WH5674>

Why do we sit still?<WH3427> Assemble<WH622> yourselves,<WH935> and let us enter into the fortified<WH4013> cities,<WH5892> and let us be silent<WH1826> there;<WH3068> for Yahweh our God<WH430> has put us to silence,<WH1826> and given us water<WH4325> of gall<WH7219> to drink,<WH8248> because we have sinned<WH2398> against Yahweh.<WH3068>
We looked<WH6960> for peace,<WH7965> but no good<WH2896> came;<WH6256> and for a time of healing,<WH4832> and behold,<WH1205> dismay!

The snorting<WH5170> of his horses<WH5483> is heard<WH8085> from Dan:<WH1835> at the sound<WH6963> of the neighing<WH4684> of his strong ones<WH47> the whole land<WH776> trembles;<WH7493> for they have come,<WH935> and have devoured<WH398> the land<WH776> and all<WH4393> that is in it;<WH5892> the city and those who dwell therein.<WH3427>
For,<WH7971> behold, I will send serpents,<WH5175> adders,<WH6848> among you,<WH3908> which will not be charmed; and they shall bite<WH5391> you,<WH5002> says Yahweh.<WH3068>
Oh that I could comfort<WH4010> myself against sorrow!<WH3015> My heart<WH3820> is faint within me.<WH1742>

Behold,<WH6963> the voice of the cry<WH7775> of the daughter<WH1323> of my people<WH5971> from a land<WH776> that is very far<WH4801> off:<WH3068> isn't Yahweh in Zion?<WH6726> Isn't<WH4428> her King in her?<WH3707> Why have they provoked me to anger with their engraved images,<WH6456> and with foreign<WH5236> vanities?<WH1892>
The harvest<WH7105> is past,<WH5674> the summer<WH7019> is ended,<WH3615> and we are not saved.<WH3467>
For the hurt<WH7667> of the daughter<WH1323> of my people<WH5971> am I hurt:<WH7665> I mourn;<WH6937> dismay<WH8047> has taken hold on me.<WH2388>
Is there no balm<WH6875> in Gilead?<WH1568> is there no physician<WH7495> there?<WH3588> why then isn't<WH724> the health of the daughter<WH1323> of my people<WH5971> recovered?<WH5927>
